Activity: Log in, check emails. Briefly check social media.
Refine the character's walk cycle animation based on feedback (if any). Focus on smoothing the transitions and adding subtle details like head bob and arm swing.
Create a simple jump animation. Consider the character's weight and momentum during the jump. Save as Jump_v01
Begin working on combat animations. Start with a basic punch animation. Focus on conveying power and impact.
Create another combat animation: a kick. Vary the speed and power of the kick to create different variations.
Start working on interaction animations. Create an animation for picking up an object. Consider the character's reach and the weight of the object.
Review the animation library. Ensure all animations are consistent in style and quality. Save all the animation files.
Back up files and clean workspace.
